name: Who is the Chicken?
description:
Game created for the Just RTP Game Jam.

Plot

Philipe and Rudolph need a miracle to stay together.

Where to look if not into the Miracles's Tower? That's why peoples call it like that, isn't it?

They must go through an haunted forest full of bizzare creatures, solve tricky puzzles and face thrilling trials.

Will they find the courage to stand togheter?

Features
  • 1+ hours of gameplay
  • characters can split up and be played independently
  • many different puzzles to solve
  • one of the main characters is a chicken
